item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest data type contains general information relating to attempted credit card information changes. Local accountId The account ID to which the credit card and billing information is associated with. Type: integer amount The total amount of the attempted transaction, represented in decimal format as US Dollars ($USD). Type: decimal billingAddressLine1 The physical street address. Reserve information such as "
